Incinerate.display_help: You are being Incinerated. It burns!
Incinerate.display_target_help: You are being Incinerated. It burns!

Freezing_Touch.display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

Ice_Blast.display_help: FrostFire's Ice Blast has chilled you, slowing your attack and movement speeds.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: FrostFire's Ice Blast has chilled you, slowing your attack and movement speeds.

Freeze_Ray.display_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: FrostFire has Held you frozen in a block of Ice.

Chilblain.display_help: You are Immobilized and taking cold damage over time.
Chilblain.display_target_help: You are Immobilized and taking cold damage over time.

Flashfire.display_help: You are Disoriented and on fire!
Flashfire.display_target_help: You are Disoriented and on fire!

Blazing_Aura.display_help: You are taking fire damage from FrostFire's Blazing Aura.
Blazing_Aura.display_target_help: You are taking fire damage from FrostFire's Blazing Aura.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: You are slowed from FrostFire's Chilling Embrace.
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: You are slowed from FrostFire's Chilling Embrace.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Outcast can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Outcast can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Lightning_Field.display_help: While active, the Outcast emits a storm of electricity around himself that constantly damages all nearby foes.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: While active, the Outcast emits a storm of electricity around himself that constantly damages all nearby foes.

Havoc_Punch.display_help: The Outcast has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.
Havoc_Punch.display_target_help: The Outcast has electrocuted you and temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery with his Charged Brawl.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Fire_Ball.display_help: A Fireball consumes a targeted foe, and any other enemy, in a tight radius. Anyone in that area is burned and damaged over a short period of time.
Fire_Ball.display_target_help: A Fireball consumes a targeted foe, and any other enemy, in a tight radius. Anyone in that area is burned and damaged over a short period of time.

Fire_Imps.display_help: Summons 3 to 6 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.
Fire_Imps.display_target_help: Summons 3 to 6 small Fire Imps to a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only posses the most rudimentary instincts. Be sure to summon Fire Imps near the enemies you wish them to attack.

Fire_Shield.display_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast
Fire_Shield.display_target_help: While this power is active, you get a good resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast

Ice_Sword.display_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Sword.
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Sword.

Ice_Blast.display_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Blast.
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: The Outcast has Slowed your movement and attack rate with his Ice Blast.

Freezing_Touch.display_help: You are held, frozen in a block of ice.
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: You are held, frozen in a block of ice.

Frozen_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, you coat yourself in rock hard Frozen Armor. The hardness of the Frozen Armor offers good defense to Smashing and Lethal attack as well as reduces Cold damage. Also, Fire attacks deal slightly less damage. Recharge: Very Fast
Frozen_Armor.display_attacker_hit: You are now more defensive to smashing and lethal attacks.

Rock_Armor.display_help: While this power is active, the Outcast's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make the Outcast highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Outcast.
Rock_Armor.display_target_help: While this power is active, the Outcast's skin becomes Stone. Rock Armor make the Outcast highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal based attacks. They are less likely to land and affect the Outcast.

Stone_Mallet.display_help: The Outcast Summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.
Stone_Mallet.display_target_help: The Outcast Summons a Stone Mallet from the very earth. Stone Mallet, deals moderate damage and can knock down foes.

Stone_Spears.display_help: The Outcast can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.
Stone_Spears.display_target_help: The Outcast can cause Stone Spears to erupt around an enemy target and all nearby foes. The Stone Spears deal moderate lethal damage.

Brawl.display_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.
Brawl.display_target_help: When all else fails, use your own 2 fists.

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: The Outcast can rip a Boulder out of the ground and Hurl it a short distance. The Hurled Boulder deals medium damage and can Knockback foes.
